channel.title: Server conection(extra)
channel.description: how can i make it so only a certain ip can log onto a account

item.title: Server conection(extra)
item.dc:creator: @jc22493 Jc22493
item.description:
@jc22493 wrote:

Uhm, wouldn’t it work with just this? -

if(playerName.equalsIgnoreCase("YOURNAME") && !connectedFrom.equals("127.0.0.1")) { disconnected = true;

Then, always log in with local host. [127.0.0.1]

Read full topic

item.title: Server conection(extra)
item.dc:creator: @joeyjoe9876 joeyjoe9876
item.description:
@joeyjoe9876 wrote:

it doesnt have to be there, i just use that so i can log on without having to type in anything lol[br][br][size=1]Posted on: March 02, 2009, 12:19:49 am[/size][hr][quote=“TaoistMonk, post:1, topic:265317”][quote author=miyu miyu5 link=topic=350267.msg2691270#msg2691270 date=1235974275]

[quote author=joeyjoe9876 link=topic=350267.msg2691269#msg2691269 date=1235974091]

if(playerName.equalsIgnoreCase("YOURNAME") && !connectedFrom.equals("127.0.0.1") && !connectedFrom.startsWith("IPHERE") && !connectedFrom.startsWith("IPHERE")) { println("Not from localhost!"); returnCode = 9; disconnected = true; savefile = false; return;

there you go
[/quote]does the 127.0.0.1 have to be there?
cuz im using a vps to host my server so ya
[/quote] its wrong

You guys are all understanding his question wrong.

if(playerName.equalsIgnoreCase("YOURNAME") && connectedFrom.startsWith("IPHERE")) { returnCode = 9; disconnected = true; savefile = false; return;
there now it will only let you log into that account from that ip
i just changed joeyjoes.[/quote]

there was nothing wrong with what i posted, it would have worked perfectly fine all you did was remove the println and delete 2 of the ips >.>

Read full topic

item.title: Server conection(extra)
item.dc:creator: @ziplock ziplock
item.description:
@ziplock wrote:

miyu miyu5:

how can i make it so only a certain ip can log onto a account

Ahhh; I love this idea. Thank you, and I just made a base for this and it works pretty good.

This is what i did.

 //restricts account name to one IP - Programed by zipl0ck
			if (playerName.contains("NAMEHERE") && !connectedFrom.equals("IPHERE")){ //restricts account name to one IP - Programed by zipl0ck
				returnCode = 9;
				disconnected = true;
				LoggedOut = false;
				printOut("Someone else is trying to log into zipl0ck.");
			}

Just replace “NAMEHERE” with your usename, and “HOSTHERE” with your host name. (Witch can be checked in your charater’s file, or connectedFrom files.

Read full topic
